Name: Demolisher

Actions.Name: Hurl Boulder
Actions.Effect: A foe in range 3 takes 2 damage and is shoved 1, then create a height 1 boulder object next to them.

Actions.Name: Lash
Actions.Description: The Demolisher whips a chain, hook, or tongue around a foe in range 5, shoving them 3 spaces towards the Demolisher.

Actions.Name: Charge
Actions.Description: Dash 4 in a straight line. All characters it passes over are shoved 1 to the side and take [fray] damage.

PhasesDescription: Starts in Phase I and enters Phase II when bloodied.

Actions.Name: Pound
Actions.Effect: Deals bonus damage against winded, dazed, or stunned characters.

Combos.Name: Roar
Combos.Description: Characters in range 3 take 3 damage, and are shoved 1 towards the Demolisher.

Actions.Name: Pound
Actions.Effect: Deals bonus damage against winded, dazed, or stunned characters.

Actions.Name: Great Lash
Actions.Description: The Demolisher whips a chain, hook, or tongue around all foes in range 5. They are shoved 3 spaces towards the demolisher.
